aluminium.description: Aluminium plates, sheets and strip, of a thickness exceeding 0.2 mm

cement.description: White Portland cement, whether or not artificially coloured

fertilisers.description: Ammonia, anhydrous or in aqueous solution
Mineral or chemical fertilisers containing two or three of the fertilising elements nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium (except 3105 60 00)
